data.additional_notes:
#### SDHQ's Build Score Breakdown


Even though there are some issues to work through, I felt a hint of magic coming from Disney Dreamlight Valley.
- **Performance:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Visuals:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Stability:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Controls:** ★★★★☆ (4/5)
- **Battery:** ★★★★☆ (4/5)
